website_summaries.verdict: Those wanting durable metal slats with a vintage frame will find their match in this exceptional model.
pros: Option to purchase as a daybed and trundle
Smaller, center legs provide supreme stability
cons: Color not true to online pictures

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy, elegant
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed for my upstairs w/ slanted ceilings. It fits perfectly against the wall and the dimensions quoted are accurate. It's sturdy, elegant, and easy to assemble. I was very happy that it came w/ the trundle and all the slats for a decent price. This bed and trundle will be perfect for extra guests staying over for get togethers and holidays. My only dislike is the visible silver screws, but a little paint will fix that right up. Kind of a given when buying something that needs to be assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite bed
customer_reviews.text: Bed looks pretty nice once finished putting together. Assembling took about 2 hours or so. It was a little confusing at first but we figured it out! It’s pretty sturdy and looks really pretty. I recommend getting a 6” mattress if you really want the detail to stand out. I got an 8” mattress and it covers it up a bit. Also, be gentle with the bed! I do think the bed itself can hold a bit over the weight limit. Overall great bed I’m in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Fett

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Sturdy and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Looks Great in my daughters second bedroom in her apartment. It was very sturdy when put together properly. My daughter had her surrogate dad put it together for her. He did an awesome job. When her dad I visited her in May, we slept on it and we slept VERY well. She purchased the memory foam mattress to be placed on it. Both were excellent purchases. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: JaziJoi

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, easy to assemble, looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just put this bed together today. It's just as pretty as pictured. No missing pieces, no damaged parts, all tools included to do the job. It looks really overwhelming when you see all the pieces, but it went together swiftly and easily. I purchased 2 6 inch thick memory foam mattresses which fit perfectly and are really comfortable. It was perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but the frame platform could have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but the frame platform could have been designed simpler... took 1-1/2 hours to put together. Also, the bed wasn't long enough, so the mattress was tight and we couldn't slip the sheets or bedspread between the footboard and the mattress. Had to get some thick rubber washers from the hardware store to serve as spacers at the bolts between the platform and the footboard. Update - we have had this bed for 9 months now, it is being used daily and is holding up fine!
customer_reviews.author: BDV

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot day enough good things about this bed! It’s absolutely gorgeous for starters. The quality is amazing especially for such a low price, I was actually shocked. Very easy to put together and a very sturdy well made product. It arrived a lot sooner than the projected timeframe. Perfect for a spare room or child’s room. It truly is a beautiful bed and the trundle slides nice and easy underneath and even has wheel locks so it stays in place. I very highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's OK.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to know what color this bed is, it is a FLAT brown; not bronze. it feels like it has rusted and then been sprayed a flat brown tint. If you have ever felt metal that has rusted, then you know what this feels like to the touch. It appears sturdy, but only time will tell. The style is nice and as appears on the webpage.
customer_reviews.author: gmom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I will say that this bed is obviously VERY cute and stylish. On another note, I didn’t have any help putting it together so if you’re in a similar situation be prepared to spend about 3 hours on lol. It does squeak quite a bit from my daughter moving around in it but that could be my handy man skills. It’s a great price for a over all great bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bed is perfect for my daughter's room. Set up took about an hour and a half with my 2 year old moving parts on me and trying to help. The tools are all provided and everything fit together with ease! It had great instructions, and everything was letter marked to make it simple. It feels very sturdy, I can't wait to get the mattresses and everything in it! I really love it, and I totally recommend it if you're looking for a cute twin size daybed with trundle. The wheels on the trundle work great, and have a lock on the 2 back wheels to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: cherrypistol8

customer_reviews.title: This bed frame is wonderful..
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is wonderful...take your time and put it together right and you will love it...I am a woman 75 years of age and I did it by myself...
customer_reviews.author: Anndria Lattomus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Twin Bed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter who is transitioning from a toddler bed. No box spring needed & gives two extra "legs" to adjust height of the bed, that can be done very easily, without disassembling the entire bed. We opted for the shorter "legs", which makes bed less than a foot from the floor, very 4 year friendly. It is a sturdy metal, with a "french country" feel, extremely easy to assemble, & gorgeous. Purchased a great mattress to go with this, Molblly 8 in Memory Foam Mattress In A Box. Very comfortable & affordable. I may order one in queen for my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Smay in Louisiana

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Holes did not match up when I was assembling it, so I couldn't get the screws in, I reassembled and got the same result, this isn't the first time this has happened with these beds, and I had multiple people help, the manufacturer is not testing these products or putting them together correctly, I had to take a hammer and push a piece in place to get the holes to match up, im not buying another bed so im just going to keep as is but I refuse to write a good review on a product thats not satisfactory, regardless of how cheap it is, I should get a product that works correctly
customer_reviews.author: Christina Gonsalves

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: my daughter picked this bed out because she was done with her bunk bed, she choose this one because of its style and price. she was able to assemble it by herself, only asking her dad for help once. i read reviews about the middle bar breaking but so far hers is doing fine (shes 16 so she won’t be jumping on it or being excessive). if anything you could reinforce it with a wood board. she doesn’t have a box spring on it and it does not bug her. she has had this for a month and loves it. i took pics to show the highest bed setting and the middle bar.
customer_reviews.author: valentine

customer_reviews.title: I loved this bed because unlike alot more expensive metal beds
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 yr old and it's stunning. I loved this bed because unlike alot more expensive metal beds, this one has a third leg in the middle for added support. I find that very important and one of the main reasons bed's sag. Let's face it, a 4 yr old is gonna jump on the bed no matter how many times a parent tells them not to. But with the added 3rd leg, I feel that this bed will be around for years to come/
customer_reviews.author: J. DeMartini

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bed frame! It arrives quickly and wasnt difficult to assemble. I love that there are 2 heights for the bed so we can raise the mattress height as my daughter grows! This frame is sturdy enough for my husband and I to both lay in bed with our daughter for story time and doesnt make any noise with movement which is appreciated to help keep an active 3 yo sleeper asleep lol. There were some minor imperfections in the finish but nothing that would be worth subtracting a star.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah GG

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, nice design
customer_reviews.text: Great bed, nice design, quality is okay, time to put together much longer than described in instruction, but one thing that was awesome, one slat was missing and the seller promptly sent me two spares. Thanks so much! Highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Do it your self building prioject
customer_reviews.text: First let me say the finish was great, even with all the handling, none of the paint came off. Second all of the parts were present. Nothing missing. Good instructions... easy to follow. Took about an afternoon to put together by myself, could have used a couple of extra hands now and then, but managed with out.
customer_reviews.author: RD WHITEHURST

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the low price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed for my daughter's Junior year of college. I purchased the bed because of the good reviews. It arrived three days early but when my son and daughter first saw the box it had a hole in it. They did not take a photo. I did take photos of the condition of the bed when we started putting it together. There are very visible dents, a broken area, lots of rust and an area that is black. Very disappointed in the condition of this bed! I'm sorry for the blurry photos. One of the photos shows how the broken part is supposed to look.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun P.

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up, One Kid Down!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble (About an hour with pauses to give my bad back a break, and to care for a newborn). It seems pretty sturdy, and suprisingly all of the pieces actually lined up for the first time in lower priced product history lol! No markings, dents, dings, etc. so I'm verry happy with the purchase. Also, I didn't even notice in the description when I bought it: There are two heigh settings. One is great for kids transitioning from a crib/toddler bed to a big kid bed, and the other is higher (pictured) for bigger kids and under-bed storage!
customer_reviews.author: Ash MarksTM

customer_reviews.title: A stylish daybed for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my new daybed. I purchased a second hand one and it was missing a leg but I called the manufacturer and they sent a replacement. They were very responsive. It was easier to assemble than I expected. It is sturdy enough and looks great in my guest room. The finish was slightly dull but the new leg that came looked great. I would recommend buying a new one and not a second hand one but overall I am a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: CarolM

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy I didn't listen to the negative reviews and bought this. The price is phenomenal and it is so simple to put together. Just a tip, when building things never tighten the bolts all the way until it is entirely complete. This bed is metal so there's no give if you're trying to fit the rods in place, so you need to make sure the bolts aren't fully tightened until all pieces are assembled then go back over the bed and tighten all the bolts. Love this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little intimidated when I saw all of the little pieces in the box. I have put together at least 20+ furniture items and this was by far the easiest! It took me about an hour and a half all by myself. The instructions were easy to follow and all of the parts fit perfectly! It is so pretty too! The slats are ingenious! I will advise you to set it up in the room it is going in and make a BIG space to put it together. Great item for a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two year old daughter. The box is heavy when delivered. It looks like a lot to assemble but it’s really not once you get into it. This bed frame seems sturdy and looks elegant in her room. My husband and I can both fit comfortably with her on this bed when she’s fussy. We put the 6” mattress right on the bed frame and it’s comfortable. We also set the bed in the highest height setting and she has no problems getting in or out. I’ll buy a matching one for our youngest daughter when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great bed! Will purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.text: I must admit purchasing furniture online was a little scary for me. Those fears were quickly calmed when this bed arrived. I am very pleased! I will remember this seller and would be happy to purchase from them in the future. The bed was bought for a teenage girl. But 3 adults sat on the bed to see how it would hold up and it did very well.
customer_reviews.author: T Harris

customer_reviews.title: Okay if your child is a little older.
customer_reviews.text: This bed isn't ideal as a transition bed for a toddler, which is exactly what we bought it for. The headboard has gaps just big enough for a small head to fit in. The base is 2" wider than the standard twin mattress size which isn't too bad, unless you're worried about your child rolling off and hitting their head on the rail on the way down. We had to add bumpers to address these two issues so we didn't worry so much about mishaps through the night. Other than that, it was okay for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony V.

customer_reviews.title: eh... don't do it - don't buy ...
customer_reviews.text: eh...don't do it - don't buy it. When we received this bed all of the pieces were in the box (that's the only positive I've got). For starters some of the holes were stripped so the screws would just turn and turn others wouldn't even fit in the holes. Holes did not match up so some screws would had to be put in at an angle. I was so close to just taking it apart and sending it back. If we hadn't just moved and my daughter hadn't needed a bed, I would have. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: meh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 year old daughter. It’s her first big girl bed and she loves it. Low to the ground and holds both myself & her when I put her to sleep. I’d recommend for younger people/kids because it’s low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: My26

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This matches my daughter’s room perfectly and she loves it! The only reason I didn’t give it four stars was a tiny portion of it (not visible once put together) was already rusted and it wasn’t super easy to put together like I had hoped it would be. Overall, it’s sturdy and it’s a great bed frame that I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia L Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but not well made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my 2 year old. It is really a pretty bed and looks so nice in her room. We've had it about a year and the support in the middle will not stay upright. It slides to the side and the middle sinks in. It does have chipped paint (arrived like that) but it didn't bother me bc it was a good price. However, the middle should not be sinking in when a 2 year old sleeps in it. It probably will not be hard to prop the middle up, but it's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful! Perfect for my girls!
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful! What can I say, the bed looks even better in person, I did put something on the corners of the bottom pull out because it was scratching my walls and hurt when hit. But perfect for two girls who share a room to small for two beds. Edges on the design are smooth and not rough which was good.
customer_reviews.author: manning

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it is
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty, looks nicely made...however. The main support square rail under the head of the bed is already bent. Only 1 person uses this bed. The little plastic clips that hold all the support rails in place randomly fall out. Ok for a guest room but would not recommend for constant use or two people. Not as sturdy as it claims. I would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: So i just finished assembling the full size day bed with the twin size trundle, took me 3 hrs all together by my self, and I am no expert what so ever! It wasnt bad, what was time consuming was the snap ons. Lets see how well it holds up! Its for a 4 yr old so it should do good.
customer_reviews.author: Yaily

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is gorgeous in my daughters room and is really nice quality. My father in law and I put it together. Luckily he is very handy as it does have a million parts to it. Would be hard to put together for just one person but not impossible. Such a great deal for the price and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough even for the guest room.
customer_reviews.text: I was putting this together and my wife walked in and said it looked so cheap. I know I took a risk based on the the reviews and price but I thought maybe I’d get lucky. The bolts strip out easy. The provide extra, doesn’t help if the threads are bad. I am sending it back. I’ll spend a bit more to get more.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, sturdy, safe, quick assembly kids bed
customer_reviews.text: Best kid's bed ever bought Thought through design Dual height adjustment Middle sidefoot smartly placed so doesn't hurt the toes Quickest assembly with zero nuts, just bolts Great quality Excellent paint Great value to the point that out should have been more expensive because other more expensive beds are worse
customer_reviews.author: Ausaf W. Masud

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great frame and pretty easy to assemble. Update: I’ve had this bed for about a year and a half and it still looks amazing! Tightened a few screws but nothing major. Great purchase and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KSSR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect bed for our toddler. My husband and I assembled in about 2 hours (could have been less but chasing a toddler in between and feeding which left hubby alone some). It is pretty much just pictures and matching part A with hardware 1. Some hardware did kick the bucket, but they actaully send extras with it for both the bed and the trundle so we had plenty and still extras for down the road. There were no imperfections or sharp pieces on ours. It also comes with the wrench and allen key for the hardware so no having to get the toolbox. Best purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great bed with great assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The price is good Easy to follow instructions for assembly All tools to put the bed together are included Looks great after assembled Cons: took some muscling to fit all the parts together Over all this was a great buy. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Easy one person assembly
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous sturdy bed! Exactly as pictured. Beyond easy to assemble alone. Took me less than 30 mins with electric driver. Step by step clear instructions with labeled parts. Packaged well without the use of styrofoam! Highly recommended!! *came with extra replacement parts*
customer_reviews.author: Krypta9

customer_reviews.title: nice daybed
customer_reviews.text: nice daybed, all parts included, used blue Loctite threadlocker on all screws, sturdy bed. did noy use trundle, lower area is good for storage bins.only problem was I had dremel 4 post holes slightly for the screws to run in freely. if you wan to use a daybed as a couch get one without the trundle.
customer_reviews.author: catsguitarsmotorcycles

customer_reviews.title: For the price this was a pretty good deal but was very very difficult to put ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this was a pretty good deal but was very very difficult to put together. We had the whole thing together and we're trying to put the cross beams in at the end and they were fitting. We ended up breaking some pieces trying to get them in and it was a huge pain. Also it is a lot lower than we had thought. If it were easier to put together I would have given more stars because it looks nice but I'm pregnant and putting it together left my husband and I screaming at each other because it was so difficult!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky/creaky. Make sure to tighten all connections extremely well ...
customer_reviews.text: Squeaky/creaky. Make sure to tighten all connections extremely well. Added an egg crate on top of the slats too.
customer_reviews.author: NLizak

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is really nice looking in the spare bedroom. It is very sturdy. I was able to put it together by myself and had very few issues in doing so. The trundle fits well underneath and both make great extra sleeping spaces for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great feminine bed for girls room
customer_reviews.text: Received this bed for my 10 year old daughter. Package came quickly, no damage to box or materials inside. Was able to assemble within 30 minutes. EASY to follow instructions. Box was awkwardly big, so did need help carrying it up a flight of stairs. After assembly, placed a 10" memory foam on the bed, laid down and tossed/turned around on it, very study, no wobbling. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Alysha W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and a lot of pieces
customer_reviews.text: The delivery guy art it on the porch of my complex. The box was destroyed and only had 5 pieces of hardware, and no instructions. Beautiful and a lot of pieces. If you the right equipment it will be worth the purchase if not no.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: was able to assemble the bed frame yesterday and it looks absolutely wonderful. It is exactly as I visioned it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Dear Hearts: was able to assemble the bed frame yesterday and it looks absolutely wonderful. It is exactly as I visioned it to look and I recommend it highly. I wish I had a second person to help assemble it, but honestly, it is easy to put together and it is sturdy. All Love
customer_reviews.author: Padme A'Tea (Lyn Gilbert)

customer_reviews.title: Strong and stylish bed fit for a princess
customer_reviews.text: My kids are the song “Monkeys jumping on the bed...” the bed takes it all and is very sturdy. I’m 220# and 6’-0” tall. I can lay in bed and tuck my little girl in and not worry about the bed at all. It’s very strong and easy to assemble. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not good structure, don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The bed is heavy and needs two grown ups at least to carry on and assemble correctly. We bought it for our 9 yo daughter, she is light weight and out of the sudden the main structure bens as show in the picture. We have to go into the hurdle to return it... in assemble- packing and coordinated shipping with Amazon... but it’s not possible that a bed made for a couple ( full size) bens this way!
customer_reviews.author: Micheluz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect :)
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this bed! It’s been moved three times now and came apart and put back together just fine. There was one pieces where the holes didn’t line up just a hair so I needed help putting that piece together. But I am 5’2” and 100lbs and put nearly the entire thing together by myself. I bought this bed for myself and two toddlers to sleep in together and it has been so great. They do jump on it a lot so it’s gotten a bit squeaky, but we are really rough playing around on it. Great bed, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Tonguis

customer_reviews.title: Nicre bed but some quality issue
customer_reviews.text: This a very nice bed. It took me one hour to mount it. it is better to be in 2 people. The bed is sturdy and my daughter will use it. The only flaw I found concerns the head of the bed. One of the hole that is suppose to match the leg hole to put the bolt does not match exactly (about 1/16 of an inch). So I could not put the bolt. I had to use my driller to enlarge the hole and put a washer to make it work. I was not willing to send it back because it was already mounted and I would like to avoid the hassle of a return.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks
customer_reviews.text: The bed looks great and the trundle is perfect for the space, but after the first few months the bed squeaks EVERY time my 11 year old moves in it. I’ve tried repositioning bars and even considered W-D 40. It is overall easy to put together, but I wouldn’t buy it for anyone heavier than a 3rd grader.
customer_reviews.author: O. Martin

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: VERY easy to assemble. LOVE this frame!!! Used to have a big solid wood sleigh bed which was more of my late husband's style than mine. Part of the healing was to make my bedroom mine and this fit the bill perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: June Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality. This came to us bent in the box. Managed to put it together (after realizing a lot of the screws were missing) and a month later, bed has fallen apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Apple

customer_reviews.title: Creaky/squeaky !
customer_reviews.text: I am basically happy with this bed - it is sturdy and seems to be well made. It was easy to assemble. But after about a month's use, it has begun to be very creaky/squeaky when I move very much. Since I live alone, it doesn't really bother me, but it might be a problem for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Look lovely In my daughter room; She’s 18 and we have two full size mattresses on this frame.because my daughter wanted it to be higher up.. It’s holding up really good no bending or breaks of anything. Easy to set up even tho it came with a lot of piece. The only thing you don’t have to put together is the head and footboard
customer_reviews.author: Ronetta Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Timeless!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as advertised. Very sturdy. I love that it has two heights for the mattress, so if this is for a child you can lower it. Instructions were clear, but it did take a little while to assemble due to all of the individual bottom slats. Such a great purchase, my daughter loves it. Should last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: C.E

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I assembled the bed and trundle in one hour. The instructions were easy to follow and tools needed were provided. The bed makes a wonderful addition to our guest room. We have all ready had our grandkids visit and use the bed. The bed did fine with two teenagers sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.author: William B

customer_reviews.title: bed fram bent in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Actually we really liked the bed originally. But 6 months in the metal bar on the day bed bent in the middle. It's useless as is. Trying to see if we can get the bar replaced but still have to rebuild the bed. Which is an job in it self. Oh the building of the bed...need two people and it takes a while.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: The Beautiful Butterfly Bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: This DHP twin bed is absolutely perfect in terms of craftsmanship and aesthetic beauty. It was so easy to assemble that I could do it (I detest assembling anything) without any problems in twenty minutes. It was purchased to replace a much more expensive bed and my daughter loves it more.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rorie

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Niece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my niece that is finally getting her own room. They have not built it either, so i wouldn't be able to ask them anything yet. They are waiting til they move into their new home to built it. Sorry, the only information i can give is that its pretty! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G

customer_reviews.title: Making sound now
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product. Was not so bad to assemble. But makes creaking sound which can be annoying sometimes. Not so great for constant use. More of a guest and decorative bed.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I've only had this bed up for a few days but my daughter loves it. I was surprised to find out that the frame has options to make the mattress higher or lower; I have mine low for my four year old but it's nice that I can move it up once she's more confident. The bed is adorable and for the price, worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: ashleyv013

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom ,this bed is so much sturdier then expected and it looks like one of those more expensive frames. She loves this frame and goes perfect with her beach theme room!
customer_reviews.author: VelvetV

customer_reviews.title: Assembly: Easier than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bed and it only took about 35/40mins to put together (to include reading the instructions and doing an inventory on parts). Only issue for me is the bottom cap pieces were missing.
customer_reviews.author: JaneN

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with this purchase. Frame a year and a half old and being used by a 3 year old less than 30 pounds. The center supporting post connection is warped and metal distorted causing the posts to fall out and the mattress to sag on both sides. If this bed can't support that little weight it could never be used by an older child or adult. Very unhappy I will need to be replacing this essentially new frame. Will not buy another product from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: EpvNNP

customer_reviews.title: Small hiccup, but great buy overall
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and well made bed. We bought for my daughter who is around 40lbs, we have had it for a couple of months and has not shown any signs of sagging or loosening. The only small complaint I would have would be that as I was building the headboard and attaching it to the rail, one screw would not go in there because the screw holes didn't match. We decided to leave it out and it has not been a problem, it does not feel lose or unsafe at all. It's a very cute, girly design
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Garnett

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the product, nice looking, sturdy and good value for the money. Delivery was as promised and the product arrived in good condition. Very impressed with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to assemble with just one person love. the two heights. There's a few rough welds mix the head and foot boards but one is against the wall and the other is covered by a mattress so no one gets scratched. Holds up to me and my daughter or my husband sleeping on it. Great first bed for toddler girl
customer_reviews.author: Dassah

customer_reviews.title: Not all the pieces fit together well
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and as described, however some of the pieces did not fit together perfectly and on one, I was not able to match up the holes to get both screws in. It still feels pretty sturdy, but moving the bed around causes the piece to pull away from the bed and has a slight wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Jannelli

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nightmare! Don't waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.text: My dream bed turned into a nightmare. I would not recommend buying this bed. Found 4 holes not tapped completely to screw the parts together just from assembling the frame. There were other holes that didn't line up properly either. I had to take it apart and take it to UPS for a return. Needless to say the original box was not reusable and I had to buy a box to ship it back so it cost me $$ in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Shelaena M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and adorable
customer_reviews.text: I would give a five star rating but the box was damaged and so was the bed, but customer service was easy to deal with and sent a replacement part promptly (the box was barely in tact but the part was fine). Easy to assemble. It looks great in my little girls room and very affordable. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and very elegant
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Got it for my 4 year old when she outgrew her toddler bed, she's extremely tall. I wish I would have skipped the toddler bed altogether and just got this one. It's very elegant looking and although my 1 year has gotten stuck in the baseboard part its been great and is not chipping at all. Fairly easy set up too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Howell

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed was fairly easy to put together and looks nice in the space I had for it. The only problem I had was the plastic clips sent to keep the metal spacers down keep popping off and some of them have broken.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my five year old. It’s very cute and she loves it. I would honestly think it costs more than this if I saw it in someone else’s house. We haven’t had any issues with sturdiness or anything and we’ve had it about two months now. Will try to update if we have any issues!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Peters

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for $100
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for a $100 twin bed. Was very easy to put together, though I did have to put my weight into it a couple times to get some holes to line up, literally just twice. Seems very sturdy two months on now. My 3 yo daughter & my 5 yo son, combined weight 75#, jump on it with no creaking or uneasy noises. I wouldn't jump on it weighing 220. If you tighten everything well it's a great, sturdy bed. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed for my 8 year old daughter. Our home is new Orleans themed, and this bed was perfect. I received my order on time, and it was easy to put together. It took me about an hour to do by myself. The instructions were very clear and easy to follow. My daughter is absolutely pleased with her new bed. Oh and the price was spectacular. I don't have any complaints. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amy hardy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so cute! A perfect bed for a princess. It was very easy to assemble. Everything was packaged nicely, and it only took my wife about 45 minutes to assemble on her own. I offered to help and she didn’t need it lol. I must say since it’s a metal frame, the package itswlf was heavy, but worth every penny. It even comes with height adjusting feet. If you have a toddler wanting to transition into a “big girl” bed. Or if your kid is pretty tall. Great bed, great value!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are easy to read
customer_reviews.text: The bed frame arrives two weeks than expected. It comes with many parts very to assemble but it’s time consuming. It took my daughter and I all afternoon to put it together. The clamps that go in the center of bed were hard to clamp so I had to use a hard cover book to pop them in in. Instructions are easy to read. The bed is very study and the way it’s put together it’s good quality. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but has lots of banged up spots and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but has lots of banged up spots and unpainted spots. It was for my daughter's birthday so it wasn't worth sending back to wait for a replacement as we wanted it all done on her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality bed frame. It is VERY sturdy, looks BEAUTIFUL, and is VERY easy to assemble with very good instructions and all the parts fit perfectly together. I was VERY pleasantly surprised and would order this bed again in a flash. It is not a rod iron frame but a tubular steel frame and not heavy like rod iron but the bed is extremely sturdy and well built and withstands heavy loads and movements in the bed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite a bit of assembly required but worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good looking bed frame for the money. It took about 45 minutes to put together, assembly was easy, but there are quite a few components that need to be put together. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brint Mclellan

customer_reviews.title: Great frame at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bed frame I’ve ordered and I’ve been happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! It did take me like 2 hours to assemble by myself and the packaging for the screws was a little wonky, but the bed frame itself was very well packaged. The frame is very stable and looks like it will hold up nicely for years. Love the look and the price. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who has sleep overs with her school friends is nice to have that extra twin bed for them. Was very easy to put together and seems very sturdy. My daughter likes the bronze finish and thinks the bed looks very pretty. All and all very happy with this bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: kpratz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & pretty
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the issue with the center support happens on hard surface floors only (guessing based on pics)? It was easy to set up & is very solid. No squeaks & low profile. 11 yr old Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: JC in NC

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old granddaughter. She was so surprised and happy? She couldn’t wait to go to sleep. Very sturdy and comfortable. my 11 year old daughter was able to sleep with her comfortably with her when she spent the night at her house. Very pretty and worth every penny spent. Easy to put together by her mother.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my sweet grand daughter's room for her birthday. I hated that my daughter in law had to put it together but that comes along with it. I love the bed and they do too. I think the bed is super sweet and a good bed to grow into. Savannah is 6. I mean sweet like a little girl and pretty enough for when she gets older. I was told the bed was not real, real hard to put together but the quality was excellent. Notice, I said not real, real hard. Meaning ask for help!!!
customer_reviews.author: sherri  underwood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my teenaged daughter after a wooded one fell apart. It took about 30 minutes to put together. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: DWhitehorne

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and the best instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions beat IKEA for thoroughness. Extra parts were included for us just in case! This is a very sturdy solid bed. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 of us a good little chunk of time to put it together. Does not need a box spring and honestly wouldn’t be able to really see the headboard if you had one. Overall very pretty for the money though!
customer_reviews.author: Zac Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It was comfortable - it was very supportive - the bed made ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently got sick and actually decided to sleep on the bed for abut 12 days to keep my husband from getting sick. It was comfortable - it was very supportive - the bed made no noises - the quality of the frame is great and the design is just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Friend

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for mattress and box springs.
customer_reviews.text: Once I got it all put together and put on my mattress and boxed springs, it no longer looked like a bed, rather mattresses stacked upon each other. The head board and the foot board were not visible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: We were so happy with this product. The finished frame is beautiful. Two of us worked together to put this together and it took about 45 minutes. Unfortunately, one of the poles was bent when it arrived but we were able to work with it, I was very worried. I loved that the product came with extra screws etc. It does come with tools but we still used a screw driver. Very sturdy!! We bought the queen frame. Color is actually more of a black which was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A

customer_reviews.title: Cute lightweight bed.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed put together but took a star off because assembly was a little difficult. Some of the pieces didn’t match that well and I had to really struggle to get it to fit. I got it but it was hard. Instructions were easy to follow as well and packaging was great nothing was scratched or bent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Its cute but I think its a bit much for the material. The screws bend easy the bed is a little wobbly even after my husband tightened every screw as tight as he could. Its not a bad bed but I was expecting something better I won't pay this much for a bed frame again . I wouldn't recommend it for an older child it may break lol my daughters around 35lbs and her jumping on it bent the screws lol it is really cute though I'll give it that and its not horrible just could use better material.
customer_reviews.author: jessica albrecht

customer_reviews.title: 4 Hands Are Better Than None :)
customer_reviews.text: It’s a two person assemble job! Honestly good luck if your attempting this by yourself! You will struggle I promise you! But other than that! The instructions were pin point and it was a easy assemble. Provided a checklist which made it smooth! This product looks even better in person! My Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lonny

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy frame
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to assemble, but the frame is not very sturdy. There’s some noise when I sit down on the bed. It’s ok to use, but not meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: My expectations was more then it is..so when by little baby is jumping on the bed it’s make a really noisy...it would been better quality
customer_reviews.author: Nur

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and stylish bed! Love the looks of it and it is of good quality. It is a pain to assemble though! Wish they could ship them set up! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Beachbound

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two for my guest room and when the boxes arrived one did not have the required parts for assembly. There is an on line reorder missing parts form from the shipper but it would not accept the numbers from either of my day beds, and it would not accept the numbers for the missing parts. It looks like others have had this problem. I'll have to wait until Monday to call, the day my guests arrive and now $800 later I have no beds for them. I wish I hadn't bought them.
customer_reviews.author: SW

product_meta.title: DHP Vintage Design Bombay Bed Frame with Metal Slats, Twin, White
product_meta.description: Style Name:Bed| Size:Twin| Color:WhiteAdd a touch of elegance to your bedroom with the DHP Bombay Metal bed. The headboard and footboard boast traditional scrollwork curves with round finial posts to provide a simple, yet classic look. Complete with metal slats and supporting legs, this bed does not require a box spring or Bunkie board. Available in a white finish that compliments a multitude of room decors, the DHP Bombay Metal Bed will be the focal point of your bedroom!.
feature_bullets: Traditional design in sturdy metal with finial detailing.
It comes with center legs for additional support as well as a metal slat sutem that provides great ventilation to your mattress. No box spring or foundation is required.
It has 2 adjustable height options: 11" and 7".
Assembles quickly and ships in one box.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,440 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
